text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump   🚨Update Alert🚨
Trump you also said the Coronavirus was a hoax. Currently 592,743+ people are confirmed to have it & 24,737+ people have DIED, “DIED!” At times like this we should be able to trust the “President” but your other 18K+ LIES make that IMPOSSIBLE!! https://t.co/szJ7Yv5HsB
